job_description:
• Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
• Excellent communication skills and the ability to work effectively in a team.
• Experience with AWS cloud technologies, particularly Lambda functions.
• Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
• 3+ years of professional software development experience.
• Hands-on experience with DynamoDB and ElasticSearch Familiarity with messaging systems like AWS SQS.
• Knowledge of containerization and orchestration with Docker and Kubernetes.
• Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools for CI/CD.
